Am I really THAT likeable.

Seriously. No really, I mean it. Seriously.

Me: "oh yeah?  Did he infected you with worms?"

Friend: "no"

Me: "ok so go on"

Friend: "His official title, as it appears on his business card is "'penetration specialist'"

I have the shakes

I woke up hungry.  Hungry and headachey.   But mostly, my stomach was growling and I could hear loudly what it wanted.  It was hooting at me:

"PIIIIIIIZZZA!!!!  PppppppppiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiIIIIIIIZzzzZZZZZZaaaaahahhhh!!!!"

Fuck dude, today is a really bad pizza craving day.  Really bad.   I would fist your granny for a slice of pepperoni.

July 23, 2006

Dreams be Dreams

"Man, I had the most fucked up dreams... People were re-enacting a battle with shoulder positioned rocket launchers.. but it was supposed to be just for show.  And these kids were all lined up to catch this flaming, SLOW, FAKE missile.   It fired into the audience, aflame, and skewered the kids in the audience.  They were bleeding and on fire" - me, still groggy, and taking my face to new hideous levels.

"yeah, I had weird dreams too, "says the boy, and he launches into his dream of Roseanne and Oprah doing some sort of public appearance.   I was trying to get pictures of them or something (I love when I'm in his dreams, even the fucked up ones).   Suddenly, Roseanne got out of the limo and climbed up to a balcony.  Only, she wasn't wearing any underwear. 

"She lifted her skirt up and like.. you could see everything.  Only, it wasn't her huge vagina that was crazy... she showed butthole too.  And it was really weird." he stops.

"It was like a black button."

Posted by thebeav in de factor | Permalink | Comments (1) | TrackBack (0)

Betsey Johnson smiled at me

I had too much wine Friday night.    Now, you may think I say that alot.   And if you DO think that, I have something for you to chew on...
YOU'RE RIGHT.

But anyway.   I had a date with my new girlfriend and we love the wine.   The funny part is, as I go into the weekend I think to myself "I hope the boy doesn't want to drink a lot this weekend because i REALLY want to do some outdoor stuff and run around town."  But then look at my stupid ass?   I drink a glass of wine, a beer, and then 2 bottles of wine over dinner.  And then I wonder why I can't keep my head up in the cab.   Sigh.   I suppose I'll learn some day.

Anyway!  I woke up twice Saturday morning.  Once around 5:00am to disover I was in my fulll outfit complete with earrings.  The boy said he managed to get my shoes off and that was it.  The rest was a little too difficult I suppose.   Either way, the second time I woke up, I wanted some hot lovin' and I wanted to get motoring!   We had the BEST breakfast (technically lunch I suppose) at this new hungarian cafe on 2nd and... 83rd maybe.   The best perfectly cooked eggs, potato pile, and wheat toast I have ever had.  And quite possibly the best coffee ever, too.   It was blustery and humid and we sat in weird little chairs outside and it was great.   

It rained, and after it rained we took the subway to 27th and 5th and ventured into the Museum of Sex (def take your parents).  There is a great exhibit there about Japanese erotic art through the... 17th century maybe?   All I know is, after looking at THAT art, I never wanted to look at my own vagina again.  The men were portrayed with huge veiney blue penises... and the women looked submissive and.. um... foldy and floppy.   The more modern exhibits were GREAT.  Hilarious early animation, weird films with hairy balls and imperfect women, and my favorite -- "sex education" films and books from the 50's and 60's.   After watching black and white boning features I was sufficiently horned up and I hopped all over the boy and tried to face fuck him from Express to Union Square.

We stumbled upon "the Var" (????) a hippie freefooted percussion crew that pounded on various pieces of crap they picked up along the way on their east coast "tour" ( I like to think it's "adulthood avoidance" with a huge splash of talent, but who am I to judge).  They were fucking awesome and so in tune with each other.   Really entertaining -- and the pounding made me want to jump the boys bones all over the place.

We walked to Spice, our favorite Thai place, and it was loud and crowded - and not as comfy and the upper east location.  In fact, it was the NYC dining experience that people warn you about.  You know the whole "be ready to order because if you say 'we need a few minutes' you'll never see your waiter again"?  Yeah, I ordered hot green tea and the guy said "cold?" and I said "no, hot".  He shows up 5 hours later with iced green tea.  I say "no, I said hot".  "oh oh, sorry".

He leaves and never comes back.  Weirdo.   It was all worth it when I saw Betsey Johnson strolling with a.. stroller.  Dressed in a leaopard print pencil skirt and an electric blue tshirt sequined in gold with the words "VIntage NYC" and a hot little belt and who the fuck knows what was on her feet because I coudln't stop staring at her yarny platinum braids and hot pink lipstick.

"It's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey JohnsonIt's Betsey Johnson" I yordled as the boy ate a Thai crepe.

She walked by and I looked like a freakin psycho.   
"SHIT! I should have slapped my sack against the window" -me.  No, I'm not pre-op transvestite.  I was not talking about my testicles.  I was, however, speaking of my very own testicle carrier(the boy)'s bday gift to me - my Betsey Johnson sack.  Best gift ever.  Love love love it.

Anyway, she walked by a second time, looked directly where the boy and I were sitting, and had to turn her head to meet my eyes.

And Betsey Johnson smiled at me.

Posted by thebeav in why my life is better than yours | Permalink | Comments (3) | TrackBack (0)

Loud wipers

You know what's disconcerting?  Being in the big corporate toilet farm and hearing... AUDIBLY DETECTING the VIOLENT wiping of the woman next to you.

I mean... are you trying to wipe it off?    gads.

I'm talking vigorous, violent, "RRRRRIITTT RIITTTT RITTTTT" after peeing.  Wild.

July 20, 2006

Anyone have any sorts?

I'm so out of sorts today.  I don't even know what that means.    But I'm out of it.   If someone is handing out sorts, I was too deep in the queue.   I'm not angry or anything, I just feel emotionless.  Kind of blah, pretty sensitive.  And no, I don't have PMS, good guess though.     I feel hurt but not by someone else.  I feel like I hurt my own feelings or something? 

Maybe I'm feeling residuals from my behavior the night before last and I am not letting myself get away with it, I don't know.   I just know that I'm having a hard time with my face.  It feels all slack and stupid.  And just kind of hanging there.    I don't want to be here, I don't want to be home.   I want the boy to come over and I don't.   I don't want to be by myself but I want to be left alone.

If anyone has any extra sorts to share with me, I'll take them.    I am experiencing a sorts deficiency.

July 18, 2006

Day 1: The diet begins again

Ok, so it's like this people.   I went to H&M yesterday to buy some "sort of nice summer work clothes" I couldn't fit into the pant size I fit into 3 months ago (freakin summer drinking and eating!!) and the tops looks like sausage casings on my stupid body.   As usual, I cried a little in the dressing room, hated my body, and VOWED to eat better. 

I got home, drank some water, ranted to my roommate about my disgusting body, and then went grocery shopping.   All fruits, veggies, and eggs.  That's right.   I'm doing the ole "cleansing" diet.   TONS of protein and fiber, and a whole lot of nothing else.   Well, the other side of it is lots o poopin'.

So, last night for dinner I had turkey lunchmeat with lettuce and hummus rolled up in it.   Alos hot lemon water and about half a jug of... stuff that I can't tell you, its a secret.  And today, I had one egg for breakfast, an assload of cran water (RAW cranberry juice drops in water), a skim latte... and no lunch yet.  But I'm eyeballing a peach. 

Let's see how it goes.

Note to the skeptical reader:  Yes, you'll note that there is no pizza in this diet.  Again.  Because like, I have failed on the pizza front about 9 times already.
